result.eng: Would you like to watch television?
result.ga: ar mhaith leat amharc ar an teilifís
result.orig: ar mhaith leat amharc ar an teilifís
result.html: ar mhaith leat amharc ar an teilifísWould you like to watch television?
result.ponchtml: ar ṁaiṫ leat aṁarc ar an teilifísWould you like to watch television?

result.html: coimhéad an carrWatch the car!
result.ponchtml: coiṁéad an carrWatch the car!

result.eng: Watch out, your bag is open!
result.ga: seachain tá do mhála ar oscailt
result.orig: seachain tá do mhála ar oscailt
result.html: seachain tá do mhála ar oscailtWatch out, your bag is open!
result.ponchtml: seaċain tá do ṁála ar oscailtWatch out, your bag is open!

result.eng: I am leaving to go watch the football match now, bye.
result.ga: beidh mise ag imeacht le dul ag féachaint ar an gcluiche peile anois slán agaibh
result.orig: beidh mise ag imeacht le dul ag féachaint ar an gcluiche peile anois slán agaibh
result.html: beidh mise ag imeacht le dul ag féachaint ar an gcluiche peile anois slán agaibhI am leaving to go watch the football match now, bye.
result.ponchtml: beiḋ mise ag imeaċt le dul ag féaċaint ar an gcluiċe peile anois slán agaiḃI am leaving to go watch the football match now, bye.

result.eng: Well, often I watch cartoons on the television.
result.ga: bhuel breathnaím ar chartúin ar an teilifís go minic
result.orig: bhuel breathnaím ar chartúin ar an teilifís go minic
result.html: bhuel breathnaím ar chartúin ar an teilifís go minicWell, often I watch cartoons on the television.
result.ponchtml: ḃuel breaṫnaím ar ċartúin ar an teilifís go minicWell, often I watch cartoons on the television.

result.eng: I love to watch cartoons on the television in the morning.
result.ga: is breá liom breathnú ar chartúin ar maidin
result.orig: is breá liom breathnú ar chartúin ar maidin
result.html: is breá liom breathnú ar chartúin ar maidinI love to watch cartoons on the television in the morning.
result.ponchtml: is breá liom breaṫnú ar ċartúin ar maidinI love to watch cartoons on the television in the morning.

result.eng: What time do you watch television?
result.ga: cén t-am a mbreathnaíonn tú ar an teilifís
result.orig: cén t-am a mbreathnaíonn tú ar an teilifís
result.html: cén t-am a mbreathnaíonn tú ar an teilifísWhat time do you watch television?
result.ponchtml: cén t-am a mbreaṫnaíonn tú ar an teilifísWhat time do you watch television?

result.html: seachainWatch out!
result.ponchtml: seaċainWatch out!

result.html: seachnaígíWatch out!
result.ponchtml: seaċnaígíWatch out!

result.eng: Would you like to watch 7 Lá?
result.ga: ar mhaith leat breathnú ar 7 lá
result.orig: ar mhaith leat breathnú ar 7 lá
result.html: ar mhaith leat breathnú ar 7 láWould you like to watch 7 Lá?
result.ponchtml: ar ṁaiṫ leat breaṫnú ar 7 láWould you like to watch 7 Lá?

result.eng: Do you have any time to watch TV at all?
result.ga: an mbíonn an t-am agat le bheith ag amharc ar an teilifís ar chor ar bith
result.orig: an mbíonn an t-am agat le bheith ag amharc ar an teilifís ar chor ar bith
result.html: an mbíonn an t-am agat le bheith ag amharc ar an teilifís ar chor ar bithDo you have any time to watch TV at all?
result.ponchtml: an mbíonn an t-am agat le ḃeiṫ ag aṁarc ar an teilifís ar ċor ar biṫDo you have any time to watch TV at all?

result.eng: I watch TV till late at night.
result.ga: bím ag amharc ar an teilifís go deireanach san oíche
result.orig: bím ag amharc ar an teilifís go deireanach san oíche
result.html: bím ag amharc ar an teilifís go deireanach san oícheI watch TV till late at night.
result.ponchtml: bím ag aṁarc ar an teilifís go deireanaċ san oíċeI watch TV till late at night.

result.eng: I watch TV. I surf the internet as well.
result.ga: bím ag amharc ar an teilifís bím ag scimeáil ar an idirlíon chomh maith

result.html: bím ag amharc ar an teilifís bím ag scimeáil ar an idirlíon chomh maithI watch TV. I surf the internet as well.
result.ponchtml: bím ag aṁarc ar an teilifís bím ag scimeáil ar an idirlíon ċoṁ maiṫI watch TV. I surf the internet as well.

result.eng: Often, we rent a video and watch it Saturday night.
result.ga: go minic faigheann muid físeán ar cíos agus amharcann muid air oíche shathairn
result.orig: go minic faigheann muid físeán ar cíos agus amharcann muid air oíche shathairn

result.ponchtml: go minic faiġeann muid físeán ar cíos agus aṁarcann muid air oíċe ẛaṫairnOften, we rent a video and watch it Saturday night.
